properties.name: roomId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: text
properties.description: The message, in plain text

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The URL to open

options.name: attachmentsUi
options.description: The URL to open

values.name: data
values.description: Any extra data to pass along. These are essentially ‘hidden’ properties.

values.name: verb
values.description: The card author-defined verb associated with this action

options.name: fileUi
options.description: The field in the node input containing the binary file data

values.name: binaryPropertyName
values.description: The field in the node input containing the binary file data

values.name: url
values.description: The public URL of the file

options.name: markdown
options.description: The message in markdown format. When used the text parameter is used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: ID of the message to delete

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: ID of the message to retrieve

properties.name: roomId
properties.description: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: List messages sent before a date and time

options.name: before
options.description: List messages sent before a date and time

options.name: beforeMessage
options.description: List messages sent before a message, by ID

options.name: parentId
options.description: List messages with a parent, by ID

options.name: mentionedPeople
options.description: List only messages with certain person mentioned. Enter their ID. You can use 'me' as a shorthand for yourself

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: ID of the message to update

properties.name: markdown
properties.description: Whether the message uses markdown

properties.name: text
properties.description: The message, in plain text

properties.name: markdownText
properties.description: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long.

properties.name: start
properties.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.

properties.name: end
properties.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Meeting agenda. The agenda can be a maximum of 1300 characters long.

options.name: agenda
options.description: Meeting agenda. The agenda can be a maximum of 1300 characters long.

options.displayName: Allow Any User To Be Co-Host
options.name: allowAnyUserToBeCoHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee with a host account on the target site to become a co-host when joining the meeting

options.name: allowAuthenticatedDevices
options.description: Whether or not to allow authenticated video devices in the meeting's organization to start or join the meeting without a prompt

options.displayName: Allow First User To Be Co-Host
options.name: allowFirstUserToBeCoHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow the first attendee of the meeting with a host account on the target site to become a co-host

options.name: autoAcceptRequest
options.description: Whether or not meeting registration request is accepted automatically

options.name: enableConnectAudioBeforeHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to connect audio in the meeting before the host joins the meeting

options.name: enabledAutoRecordMeeting
options.description: Whether or not meeting is recorded automatically

options.name: enabledJoinBeforeHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to join the meeting before the host joins the meeting

options.name: excludePassword
options.description: Whether or not to exclude password from the meeting email invitation

options.name: hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host. Can only be set if you're an admin.

options.name: integrationTags
options.description: External keys created by an integration application in its own domain. They could be Zendesk ticket IDs, Jira IDs, Salesforce Opportunity IDs, etc.

options.name: inviteesUi
options.description: Email address of meeting invitee

values.name: coHost
values.description: Whether or not invitee is allowed to be a co-host for the meeting

options.name: joinBeforeHostMinutes
options.description: The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins

options.name: publicMeeting
options.description: Whether or not to allow the meeting to be listed on the public calendar

options.name: recurrence
options.description: Rule for how the meeting should recur. Acceptable format.

options.name: requireRegistrationInfo
options.description: Data required for meeting registration

options.name: reminderTime
options.description: The number of minutes before the meeting begins, for sending an email reminder to the host

options.name: sendEmail
options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees

options.name: siteUrl
options.description: URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: meetingId
properties.description: ID of the meeting

properties.name: options
properties.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

options.name: hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

options.name: sendEmail
options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees

properties.name: meetingId
properties.description: ID of the meeting

properties.name: options
properties.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

options.name: hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

options.name: password
options.description: Meeting password. It's required when the meeting is protected by a password and the current user is not privileged to view it if they are not a host, co-host or invitee of the meeting.

options.name: sendEmail
options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Start date and time (inclusive) for the meeting. Acceptable format.

options.name: from
options.description: Start date and time (inclusive) for the meeting. Acceptable format.

options.name: hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host

options.name: integrationTag
options.description: External tag created by another application, e.g. Zendesk ticket ID or Jira ID

options.name: current
options.description: Whether to return just the current meeting or all meetings

options.name: meetingNumber
options.description: Meeting number for the meeting objects being requested

options.name: meetingType
options.description: Master of a scheduled series of meetings which consists of one or more scheduled meeting based on a recurrence rule

options.name: Meeting Series
options.description: Master of a scheduled series of meetings which consists of one or more scheduled meeting based on a recurrence rule

options.name: Scheduled Meeting
options.description: Instance from a master meeting series

options.name: Meeting
options.description: Meeting instance that is actually happening or has happened

options.name: participantEmail
options.description: Email of a person that must be a meeting participant

options.name: siteUrl
options.description: URL of the Webex site which the API lists meetings from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: state
options.description: Meeting state for the meeting objects being requested

options.name: to
options.description: End date and time (inclusive) for the meeting. Acceptable format.

options.name: webLink
options.description: URL encoded link to information page for the meeting objects being requested

options.description: Whether or not to allow authenticated video devices in the meeting's organization to start or join the meeting without a prompt

options.name: allowFirstUserToBeCoHost

options.description: Email address for the meeting host. This attribute should only be set if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

values.name: coHost
values.description: Whether or not invitee is allowed to be a co-host for the meeting

options.name: joinBeforeHostMinutes
options.description: The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins

options.name: password
options.description: Meeting password. Must conform to the site's password complexity settings. If not specified, a random password conforming to the site's password rules will be generated automatically

options.name: publicMeeting
options.description: Whether or not to allow the meeting to be listed on the public calendar

options.name: recurrence
options.description: Meeting series recurrence rule (conforming with RFC 2445), applying only to meeting series

options.description: Data required for meeting registration

options.description: The number of minutes before the meeting begins, for sending an email reminder to the host

options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

options.description: URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
